page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The two factories in our block B.E.F.and Toolchrome display characteristics in the labour force which typify employment today.Both factories operate 24 hours and employ full time staff on shift work.The day shift is from 8a.m._5p.m.,with an hour for lunch. Toolchrome employ a majority of men because most of the work is heavy. In B.E.F.the majority of workers are women because they do light work like packing.In both firms the managers are men and the secretarial staff are women.The women work till 5p.m., so some may use child minders. In Toolchrome they have mostly skilled workers because they run the machines. In B.E.F.the workers are generally unskilled as the machines work automatically the majority being programmed by computer.
